mapper.insert: insert into EmptyNestElderBaseInfo ( inputerName, street, community, name, idCard, age, gender, mobile, phone, nation, origin, political, cultural, marital, identity, householdType, censusStatus, livingConditions, permanentAddress, permanentArea,livingAddress,communityPhone,disability,disabilityCard,relativesName1,relativesRelationship1, relativesPhone1,relativesAddress1,relativesArea1,relativesName2,relativesRelationship2,relativesPhone2,relativesAddress2,relativesArea2,villageCadres,villageCadresPhone, villageCadresAddress,partyMemberVolunteers,partyMemberVolunteersPhone,partyMemberVolunteersAddress,remark,formHolder,auditor) values ( #{inputerName}, #{street}, #{community}, #{name}, #{idCard}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{mobile}, #{phone}, #{nation}, #{origin}, #{political}, #{cultural}, #{marital}, #{identity}, #{householdType}, #{censusStatus}, #{ livingConditions}, #{permanentAddress}, #{permanentArea}, #{livingAddress}, #{communityPhone}, #{disability}, #{disabilityCard}, #{relativesName1}, #{relativesRelationship1}, #{ relativesPhone1}, #{relativesAddress1},#{relativesArea1}, #{relativesName2}, #{relativesRelationship2}, #{relativesPhone2}, #{relativesAddress2},#{relativesArea2}, #{villageCadres}, #{villageCadresPhone}, #{ villageCadresAddress}, #{partyMemberVolunteers}, #{partyMemberVolunteersPhone}, #{partyMemberVolunteersAddress}, #{remark}, #{formHolder}, #{auditor})
